## End User Entity
Correctional Service of Canada

## Notice Type
Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Procurement Method
Competitive - Open Bidding

## Goods and Services
The solicitation document requires the provision of dental services to inmates at Springhill Institution. The Contractor must ensure that dental instrument sterilization is done only by dental staff that is trained according to Provincial sterilization standards.

## Deliverables
The Contractor must provide essential dental services to inmates, including coordination of care provided by dental specialists to inmates to ensure continuity and integration of care.

## Performance Requirements
The Contractor must supervise the activities of the Dental Assistants, prepare the treatment/clinical area, clean and sterilize instruments and hand pieces, pass instruments to the dentist or hygienist, and provide inmate education on oral health.
